main event: A bright light, much larger than a star, was observed moving up and descending in Wellsville, New York.
interesting points: The light was observed to be 10 to 15 times larger than a star.,The light had a white glow and was very bright.,There was a brief sighting of white objects ten times the size of the initial light moving northwest.,The sighting lasted for 15 minutes.,The conclusion suggested it could possibly be a balloon, but data was insufficient for evaluation.
